```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- read.csv("../December 1/Input.csv")
head(df)
```

```{r}
key <- NA

for(x in 1:200) {
  for(y in 1:200) {
    for(z in 1:200) {
      if((df$values[x] + df$values[y]) + df$values[z] == 2020) {
        print(paste(df$values[x], df$values[y], df$values[z]))
        key <- df$values[x] * df$values[y] * df$values[z]
        print(key)
      }
      if(!is.na(key))
        break
    }
  }
}
```
